body:

	<meta name="viewport" content= "width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, shrink-to-fit=no">
	<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
	<title>${1:Document}</title>
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/style.css">
</head>
<body>
	<main>${2}</main>
</body>
</html>

Text field.body:
<label for="${1:firstName}">${2:First Name}</label>
<input type="text" id="${3:firstName}" placeholder="${4:Enter your Name}">

Email field.body:
<label for="${1:email}">${2:Email}</label>
<input type="email" id="email" placeholder="${1:Enter your Email}">

Password field.body:
<label for="${1:password}">${2:Password}</label>
<input type="password" id="password" placeholder="${1:Enter your Password}">
